title: GENERAL
fullText:
Battery systems and BESSs shall be installed by competent persons.
Equipment that is mechanically damaged or damaged in any other way shall not be installed.
All the hazards associated with the relevant battery type and all associated components shall be identified. A risk assessment shall be performed prior to planning an installation of a battery system.
NOTE See Appendix G for additional information on risk assessment.
Each battery energy storage system shall be installed in accordance with the requirements of this Section, and the additional requirements as specified in the manufacturer's instructions with reference to the relevant safety data sheet (SDS), manufacturer system hazard information and the manufacturer's installation, commissioning and maintenance instructions.
